metadata.name: WaterGun
metadata.description:
This mod adds a new active item called "Water Gun" to the game. The item shoots many peircing tears in the direction Isaac is facing for about half a second. It does not require Isaac to stop and the tears scale off of Isaac's damage.
This is currently setup to work with the Afterbirth+ itempool. It will work with just Rebirth, however it *may* cause "Breakfast" to spawn slightly more often (this is how the game handles loading in an item it can't find). It also may just work completely correct.
